column2: The state guarantees private property and land development rights
The national administration is now run by western-educated bureaucrats
Western-style schools of higher learning are established
Our transportation system can move people and goods as never before!
We rely on the old ideas
We send our students to learn foreign ideas in science from the West
We promote research into scientific and economic theories in our schools
No Legislative Reform. The country bureaucracy works like the old days, if it exists at all.
Our legislature is now modern and efficient.
Our financial institutions and economy is run like the old days.
We started to modernize our financial institutions.
We modernized a great part of our financial institutions and now we can borrow money from other nations.
Our country doesn't have schools and education is largely disorganized.
A basic organized education system is now present in our country
The transportation system is being modernized. At least in the capital.
We have no need of industry.
Construct some basic factories with the help of foreign advisors. Could this be the beginning of an industrial revolution?
No Simple Machinery is beeing used.
We have implemented Advanced Steam Engines
Artillery is made up of ineffective siege equipment or it's not present at all.
Our artillery is imported from western powers.
Local officers lead our troops and are trained in our traditional ways.
Our troops are now trained, assisted and sometimes led by foreign officers.
We learn on the field of battle.
Officers are trained in professional army academies before leading men into battle.
Our naval officers are trained in the field of battler or knowledge is transmitted informally.
Our naval officers are trained in special naval academies and are taught by foreigners in the arts of naval warfare.
We import strong ships designs from the west.
Troops are trained in the traditional manner.
Troops trained by foreign military advisors or using foreign techniques.
Traditional weapons are used in our armies.
Fortifications are built in our traditional way or not built at all.
Forts are built in the western style and their construction is supervised by foreigners.
Our troops learn western military tactics before going into battle
Our forts are modern and more defensible
Our own officers will now lead our troops!
Our offcers are instructed in advanced military tactics before leading men into battle
Our captains lead without foreign advisors
Our captains are instructed in advanced naval tactics before leading men into battle
Each province has its own currencies.
The government adopted some currencies as official but doesn't issue them through a central bank.
The government enforces a single currency issued by a few authorized banks. This is the beginning of currency centralization and standardization
We can construct our own modern warships
With the help of further foreign investment we are able to construct even more advanced shipyards.
Our factories organization and production line efficiency has been greatly improved.
